price: 46.Wonna hinnay xagni keenik Qhiyaamah ayró, Kaadu Qhiyaamah ayró gibdiih, qeero le. (makeeko-le).
arabic: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوۡعِدُهُمۡ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدۡهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: bali al-sāʿatu mawʿiduhum wal-sāʿatu adhā wa-amarru
